alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 1:34PM EDT until May 16 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Susquehanna County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Northeastern Bradford County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 133 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Herrickville, or 9 miles north of Wyalusing, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rush, Orwell, Herrick, Rome, Le Raysville, Little Meadows, Friendsville, Warren Center, Rushville and Brackney. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
